summary: Its a BCF file for BAIN wizard,so it can be installed and managed by BAIN and the description is based on original package.
descriptionHtml:
Its a BCF file for BAIN wizard for EzEs - Colored Map Markers v7.1,so it can be installed and managed by BAIN.
The description is based on original package.

You can find EzEs - Colored Map Markers here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26556/?

how to use:
1.copy the file to \"\\Bash Installers\\Bain Converters\"
2.open wrye bash.
3.right-click on original EzEs Colored map markers package in \"installers\" tab,choose \"conversions\" -> \"Apply\" -> this file.
4.BAIN will generate a new compressed file can be installed and managed by BAIN.
5.install the new .7z package.
author: tommyonsn
